name: Let's Go! Skiing VR
description:
LET`S GO! Skiing
FUN ACTIVE VR SPORT GAME

This is a sports competitive game for friends parties and families activities aimed for promotion and popularisation all kinds of sports.

In Skiing player will feel like a skier participating in professional competitions.
Understandable gameplay and nice graphics will not leave indifferent both adults and children.

  • Collect coins
  • Keep the line
  • Watch out for obstacles
  • Set a new speed record
  • Show the best result in skiing
